abstract: Federal Aviation Administration issues single operating certificate to American Airlines and US Airways, crucial step in integrating services of the merged airlines.
lead_paragraph: The certificate means all flights will use the same maintenance, dispatch and operational procedures.

headline.main: American and US Airways Get Single Operating Certificate, Advancing Integration
headline.print_headline: Business Briefing; Single Operating Certificate for American and US Airways

snippet: The certificate means all flights will use the same maintenance, dispatch and operational procedures.
